subject: Re: Panasonic DR60
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi LK.  See if this link helps.  I see on the right, and option to 'download manual' so I hope it 
works (for free, some places charge.)  If you can't get it online, I think I have mine and I can 
copy, mail/fax to you.

http://www.usersmanualguide.com/panasonic/ic_recorder/rr-dr60

Margaret
